english.segment1: Injustice runs rampant in society. You can even find it in our own pretty democracy
english.segment2: Run!Well no!. Or hide in a 9 to 5 and don't care to know
english.segment3: Impoverished and homeless don't have a choice. Well, why should they? The money took their voice. And it flows
english.segment4: Only prepare at the next media scare.. Turn the TV on and tune out the sun. Opinions decisions seem so black and white. When we allow the media to chose our fight. Never talk of sex but condemn all abortion. Christian message is warped in transmitted distortion. Fell the sea sickening rush of the great capitalist flush. Spiraling down
english.segment5: The destruction of all that's in our way. When times get rough its time to pray
english.segment6: A Nation of greed. American apathy. A path and a blown away seed. Promoting self is the American way
english.segment7: Globalization of greed. Spiritual apathy. A path and a hollow seed. Structural collapse is on the way
english.segment8: We're living, survival of the richest. Echoes rise up from the pit. As the pendulum cuts them down. And our American world, spins around
english.segment9: Money makes money, while the poor can only get poorer. Our economic equations include the bottom mans horror. Some free men sit in prisons while some slaves sit in office. Prejudice issues manage to linger. We need reconciliation not pointing a finger. So what is our ticket out now. Where do we find truth?. Many have lost their minds or died. So we could indulge in our American pride. And now we glance at some at the corner. Who have been discarded and junked away. And forced they work up scams. To exist with me and you another day
english.segment11: Let go of possession, fear and pride. When witnessing injustice don't find a way to hide. Open our eyes to see every lie. Because you'll never find justice till the day. That you die.
